main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a saucer-shaped object with 20 flashing lights on the perimeter, around 5,000 feet in the air.
interesting points: The object was smaller than a dime held at arm's length.
The lights on the object were flashing in a specific order, going out and coming back on.
The object was observed for about 2 minutes, moving in a straight path from the southeast to the southeast at an angle of 45 degrees to 25-30 degrees.
The observer was a 23-year-old civilian salesman who reported the sighting as 'good' in reliability.
The weather conditions were clear with scattered clouds and a thunderstorm in the area.
sighted object: a saucer-shaped object with 20 flashing lights on the perimeter
location: Glenview, Illinois, near Central Ave & River Road
